code: export var deletePark=function deletePark(parkId,routerHistory){return function(dispatch){return fetch("https://national-park.herokuapp.com/parks/".concat(parkId),{method:"DELETE"}).then(function(response){dispatch(removePark(parkId));routerHistory.replace('/parks');});};};var removePark=function removePark(id){return{type:"REMOVE_PARK",id:id};};
